name: iot-access-control-system
description: Comprehensive IoT Access Control & Authentication System using Blockchain

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:simulator"
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../device-simulator && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run deploy:contracts

author: IoT Security Team
